sentences.sContent: I stood in the packed gymnasium, in a crowd of anxious spouses, children and relatives.
sentences.sContent_eng: I stood in the packed gymnasium, in a crowd of anxious spouses, children and relatives.
sentences.sCn: 我站在拥挤的体育馆，站在急切配偶的人群中，有子女和亲属。

sentences.sContent: Our volleyball team will play away tomorrow and play games in the gymnasium on Saturday.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our volleyball team will play away tomorrow and play games in the gymnasium on Saturday.
sentences.sCn: 我们的排球队明天将去外地比赛，星期六则要在体育馆比赛。

sentences.sContent: They advertised on posters outside the stadium to promise that every competitor is to have a regular physical examination in a gymnasium one after another.
sentences.sContent_eng: They advertised on posters outside the stadium to promise that every competitor is to have a regular physical examination in a gymnasium one after another.
sentences.sCn: 他们在体育场外的海报上做广告，承诺说每个参赛者都将在体育馆一个一个地参加常规的身体检查。
